column4: morning all, I have a problem where as soon as I click the login button in 10.04 I just get a blank screen. I can use ctrl-alt-f2 to get a term and have noticed that I don't have an xorg.conf, :(  Is it possible to generate one?
can ubu10.10 be installed from the terminal? maybe that will help with my problem..
Q: How do recreate the xorg.conf file, I don't have one and only get a blank screen? anyone know?
